scripts.cocoapods:install: which pod && cd ios && pod install --repo-update || echo "iOS Pods not installed due to missing 'pod' command (cocoapods) or an error"
scripts.lint: npm run -s lint:eslint && npm run -s lint:flow
scripts.build:ios:cmd: cd ios && export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=1 && xcodebuild -workspace Coorpacademy.xcworkspace -scheme Coorpacademy -derivedDataPath build
scripts.build:iphonesimulator:debug: npm run -s build:ios:cmd -- -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator | xcpretty
scripts.build:iphonesimulator:release: npm run -s build:ios:cmd -- -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator | xcpretty
scripts.test: npm run -s lint && npm run -s test:unit
scripts.storybook: npm run -s storybook:generate-stories && npm run -s storybook:start
scripts.pull:certificates: cd ios && fastlane match development --readonly && fastlane match adhoc --readonly
